uuid-generator.title: UUIDs generator
uuid-generator.description: A Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) is a 128-bit number used to identify information in computer systems. The number of possible UUIDs is 16^32, which is 2^128 or about 3.4x10^38 (which is a lot!).

ulid-generator.title: ULID generator
ulid-generator.description: Generate random Universally Unique Lexicographically Sortable Identifier (ULID).

token-generator.title: Token generator
token-generator.description: Generate random string with the chars you want, uppercase or lowercase letters, numbers and/or symbols.

hash-text.title: Hash text
hash-text.description: Hash a text string using the function you need : MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA224, SHA512, SHA384, SHA3 or RIPEMD160.
